data.message: Watching my life slip away through the ashtray I'll get in your head like Jean grey I ain't kiddin you don't wanna play I'm a keyless warlock low key with a kilo an Loki don't provoke me smoking a J with the OE...it's Joey wan kanobe your life's in danger I'm stranger than a doppelganger a head banger with one in the chamber full of anger I roll with a legion of demons in Cleveland heathens that'll leave ya bleedin an barley breathin send you through changes like the seasons im decievin soul reaving  getting even  leavin your family grievin for no reason Im Off the chain like django I'll  rape your stank hoe take your bank roll an pop you through your kangol you don't wanna tango rip you to shreds like a Bengal an eat you like a mango

replies.message: You like to fuck b.a.e. peace..kinda funny though man I was on the news cuz I was walk-in down the sidewalk smoking a blunt on the west side an two yards kids running around bunch of adults partying up on the porches I walk-in down the sidewalk see some chalk so I wrote FTP on the sidewalk as soon as I'm done writing some little 4 year old girl runs up an says FTP! What s that shit made me laugh as soon as I start laughing some old ass hoe I guess it was the grandma but I start laughing split second later bitch was like "what are you doing with that little girl" I'm like wtf then I guess couple uncles start talking shit ta me cops came I told em what happened ended up having to talk to a detective the fuckin grandma told the cops I told the little girl I said" come around the corner little girl I gotta pocket knife...bitch just assumed some bullshit anyways now I'm goin to court for assault for slappin some bitch on the ass with my skateboard on the bus I did that shit but anyways news had me on TV talking bout child enticing charges I was in court for assault for the skateboard bullshit judge didn't say shit bout no stupid shit entising bullshit but yea they made me look like a sick fuck if I made a police report saying complete bullshit lies and they reported the bullshit on the news that's pretty much what happened to me I mean yea girl on the bus was my age I did that I'm on probation for it but fuck the news man I am whatever you say I am if I wasn't why would you say I am cuz people lie anyways didn't appreciate that bullshit pedophiliac bullshit I'll call you baby and fuck your face
I actually want to start a case against the news for that I'm gonna check on that fer real ended up in a mental hospital due to them saying false shit
